personal.title: Peter James Flanagan
bio: I'm a full-stack software engineer living in New York. I fell in love with web development at a young age and have been playing with it ever since. I enjoy making useful, deliberatley designed, and fun web tools.
I kinda want to put a second paragraph here but I'm not sure how well it'll take links. I'll need to invent some type of markdown
<rollerblader> <rock climber> and then 'rollerblader' and 'rockclimber' will fill in blanks for all sorts of things like links and photos

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: While I'm not currently seeking new opportunities, feel free to reach out. I'll try my best to phone back!
